name: Gloomgeons
description:
Gloomgeons is a retro style 3D first person perspective game that combines the nostalgia of legend FPS games with the dungeons exploration. Step into a mysterious world of skeletons, wizards and golems. Unlock four weapons, collect treasure and find secret rooms. The game consists of 24 levels divided into 3 parts.

Controls:

  • W A S D - move
  • Space or E - activate
  • Mouse - look and shoot
  • Shift - run
  • 1 2 3 4 - select weapon
